name: Mekafusion #19 MF08-ZERO
description:
Model: MF08-ZERO ( Mekanic Fusion no. 8 - ZERO)
Series: CELESTIAL

Fusions:
BM04-COMBAT ( Base Mekanoid no. 4 - COMBAT )
MG-Z-ALLOY-ARMOR-T0 ( Meta Gear - Z ALLOY ARMOR PROTOTYPE ZERO)
SW-Z-SCYTHE (Sentient Weapon Z-SCYTHE)

★ Properties
• Type: Mekafusion
• Skills: Strength, Speed, Weapon mastery
• Weapon: Z-SCYTHE
• Perks: Carries a Special Armor that can withstand impact, Sub Zero Freezing.

A Mekanic fusion between a Celestial and Meta Gear Z-Alloy an indestructible armor to form an ultimate Mekafusion. ZERO can withstand heavy damage and freezes opponents at close range.

⚔ The Project - Mekafusion [ Mekanic Fusion ] 
An alliance between Meka and Meta to join forces to form ultimate mechanical robotic machines in different series of the Metaverse.

These are digitally hand-drawn in 2D artwork to make Robotic Figures 'Mekanoid'. The concept comes in different series to give mechas their Artificial Intelligence to create their own character and make lots of unique Mekafusions.

The goal is to make robot designs as it was been my childhood hobby to draw robots. Now minted in Tezos blockchain as Non-fungible Tokens (NFT) to give opportunities to art collectors and traders. Video is created in 2048x2048 pixel resolution as an iconic figure art collectible.

You can visit me on my Twitter page as the creator of Mekafusion - @XTZverse

★★★★★
Check out the website for more information at mekafusion.com
